titles.title: Menstrual Products for Employees Act of 2016
Menstrual Products for Employees Act of 2016
To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require employers to provide menstrual hygiene products for employees in workplace bathrooms.

bill.summary:
Menstrual Products for Employees Act of 2016
This bill amends the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 by requiring the Department of Labor to issue a rule that requires private employers to provide free menstrual hygiene products for employees in their bathrooms.
